name: Cube Defense
description:
You left alone camping in the mountains ... But during this time a virus has invaded the country and a cubic horde is heading towards you!

Arm yourself and overcome waves of enemies. Fill up with arms and ammunition between each wave.

How much cubic wave can you eliminate?



Features :

■ 2 cards!
■ More than 30 levels!
■ 5 different weapons!
■ Shop system at stake!
■ Addictive!
■ Low Poly decors!
■ Relaxing gameplay!
